reviewText: Good, brief overview of life and work of this wonderful Christian Master.

This video is a blessing because it allows anyone interested in Bede Griffiths and his search for God to experience not just his written words but his speech,mannerisms , personaility etc. I found the video to be very interesting  and engaging and gave me a much better sense of the person than I received from reading his various books which I also did.
A very intimate, very human portrait of the Benedictine Monk and Scholar who transcended any "boundaries" between East and West. An unforgettable film of an unforgettable being.
